basic_info.description: I'm currently a junior majoring in Computer Science at the Georgia Institute of Technology. My threads are Intelligence and Information Internetworks. I have experience in working as a full-stack developer and I also enjoy building mobile applications. I am proficient in multiple object-oriented languages, however Java has been my favorite one so far. I am also familiar with and have worked on several front-end and back-end frameworks/ libraries. Outside of school, I often play basketball with my friends, and I mostly spend my free time watching the NFL and NBA. I am a huge fan of the Seahawks and LeBron James. Thanks for checking out my page, and please feel free to contact me!

projects.title: NCR Go
projects.description: My team developed a React Native application to provide customers with information on a productâ€™s availability and its specific location (aisles) in stores. We created a computer vision machine learning model using the Microsoft Azure Computer Vision Toolkit and trained it with the Freiburg Groceries Dataset to determine whether a product is in stock or out of stock. This was a project submission for the NCRâ€™s 2022 Global Hackathon and we placed in the top 10 for the software division.

projects.title: Tower Defense Game
projects.description: Developed an android mobile application game using Android Studio with Java and XML. Implemented the Unified Process Milestones in a semester-long team project with 4 other teammates. We utilized the Git/ GitHub version control, designed diagrams (Domain Model, DCD, SSDs, and SDs), and integrated unit testing (JUnits) for the app.

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
experience.description: Worked as a full-stack developer to build an in-house RBAC configuration and analytics dashboard for the NCR BSP's SaaS API services using the Next.js React framework.

experience.title: Computer Science Tutor
experience.description: Assisted students on CS labs and assignments. Provided one-on-one tutoring for three Java classes (Computer Programming I, OOP, and Data Structures & Algorithms).
